titleStmt.title: A seasonable speech, made by a worthy Member of Parliament in the House of Commons, concerning the other House. March 1659.

notesStmt.note: By Silius Titus. Sometimes also attributed to Anthony Ashley Cooper, Earl of Shaftesbury.
